body_html:
@driazati Thank you very much for working on it! I will really appreciate this feature.

By the way, as long as my understanding is correct, there are multiple algorithms for bicubic interpolation which result in different outputs. It may be nice to mention the name of the algorithm in the documentation.

@driazati Thank you very much for working on it! I will really appreciate this feature.

By the way, as long as my understanding is correct, there are multiple algorithms for bicubic interpolation which result in different outputs. It may be nice to mention the name of the algorithm in the documentation.
